requirement.topic: Allow clients to ping xmlBlaster, to test reliable the connection.
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster interface has a ping method. This allows checking the CORBA connection. The CorbaConnection class uses this ping (if in fail save mode) and starts login polling if the ping fails. Use method CorbaConnection.initFailSave() to activate the ping feature and set the ping interval
